media:group.media:title: Course 1 | Overview
media:group.media:description: First Principles of Computer Vision is a lecture series presented by Shree Nayar who is faculty in  the Computer Science Department, School of Engineering and Applied Sciences, Columbia University. Computer Vision is the enterprise of building machines that “see.” This series focuses on the physical and mathematical underpinnings of vision and has been designed for students, practitioners and enthusiasts who have no prior knowledge of computer vision.
